title: Textile, "Zebra", ca. 1971
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 288.9 x 150.5 cm (9 ft. 5 3/4 in. x 59 1/4 in.) selvedge to selvedge
Repeat H x W: 87.6 x 148 cm (34 1/2 x 58 1/4 in.) straight repeat
description: Widely spaced curving horizontal bands in red, ivory, black and yellow crossed by an undulating narrow band. The background is alternating black and white opposed diagonals of equal widths meeting at the center line.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Zebra", ca. 1971.
ca. 1971. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Jack Lenor Larsen. 1973-54-6.
